means: 飞燕草，飞燕草子，翠雀花
[医]翠雀〔草〕属：毛莨科植物的一种，包括矮飞燕草，其种子有毒，可利尿、通经。南欧飞燕（虱）草的种子可灭虱，见staphisagria

sentence.Network_en: The experiment showed that Delphinium'Schloss Wilhelmschohe'can be propagated by stem cuttings.
sentence.Network_cn: 美丽翠雀(Delphinium ‘ SchlossWilhelmschohe’)可在春、夏季用茎枝进行扦插繁殖.

sentence.Network_en: I place a delphinium, Blue, upon your grave.
sentence.Network_cn: 在你的坟墓上,我放上一株飞燕草, 一片蓝色.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 丽江翠雀花_百度百科 ... 科中文名：毛茛科 Ranunculaceae 属中文名：翠雀属（delphinium） Delphinium 【药名】：丽江翠雀花 LIJIANGCUIQUEH…
飞燕草(Delphinium): 可补肾,壮阳.通微丝血管,增强记忆里,助黑发甜菊叶(Stevia): 最佳的天然代糖,不含热量,不会引致蛀牙,适合减肥人.
海贼王妮歌·罗宾 ... 百花缭乱·蜘蛛之花（ Spider net） 百花缭乱·大飞燕草（ Delphinium） 万轮花（ miles fleur）.
...如在较原始的毛茛科中，乌头属（Aconitum）和飞燕草属 （Delphinium）具有较进化的两侧对称花，果实却是原始的聚合蓇葖果； …

list.abs: 小草 polygala herb小草鸟 delphinium tuber小茴 fennel [fruit]
园林在线 - 植物库 ... Pulsatilla chinensis 白头翁属 Delphinium grandiflorum 翠雀花属 Clematis florida 铁线莲属.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek delphinion 'larkspur', from delphin dolphin (because of the shape of the spur, thought to resemble a dolphin's back)

entry.tran: 翠雀（花），飞燕草(一种园艺植物)
entry.def: A delphinium is a garden plant which has a tall stem with blue flowers growing up it.

means.word_mean: 1. any plant of the genus Delphinium having palmately divided leaves and showy spikes of variously colored spurred flowers; some contain extremely poisonous substances

auth_sentence.content: Other plants don't take to division, such as foxgloves, delphinium and Russian sage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other plants don't take to division, such as foxgloves, delphinium and Russian sage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Other plants don't take to division, such as foxgloves, delphinium and Russian sage.

auth_sentence.content: Cut down a delphinium's spiky bloom after it fades and, with enough water and good soil, it likely will create another flower.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cut down a delphinium's spiky bloom after it fades and, with enough water and good soil, it likely will create another flower.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cut down a delphinium's spiky bloom after it fades and, with enough water and good soil, it likely will create another flower.
